body_html: I guess? I think the most important assumption we make about functions is that if you ever return one of the inputs unmodified then it would mean that the grad of output of this function w.r.t. this input is all 1s. I can't think of anything else (apart from the linearity of derivative).
body_text: I guess? I think the most important assumption we make about functions is that if you ever return one of the inputs unmodified then it would mean that the grad of output of this function w.r.t. this input is all 1s. I can't think of anything else (apart from the linearity of derivative).
body: I guess? I think the most important assumption we make about functions is that if you ever return one of the inputs unmodified then it would mean that the grad of output of this function w.r.t. this input is all 1s. I can't think of anything else (apart from the linearity of derivative).
